attributes.additional_details:
I am a qualified teacher with more than 21 years running business in the Private Sector. 

Until now I have blindly accepted the unequal way of electing a government. 
As a responsible citizen I feel I must call for this change in the parliamentary system in the United Kingdom.
This has to change now.
attributes.background:
I strongly believe that Proportional Representation is the democratic and fair way to elect Members of Parliament in the United Kingdom.
We will then have a truly representative government elected democratically.
